name: litsphere
description: A litsphere texture is used for emulate lighting and reflections inside MakeHuman. It thus has no effect outside MakeHuman. For any clothing (not just leather), you will want to use the "leather" litsphere.
label: Litsphere
items: Leather litsphere. This is appropriate for all clothes, not only leather.
Standard skin litsphere. This is appropriate for all skins.
The standard hair litsphere without effects
A litsphere to create a mat finish e.g. for a suit
A litsphere designed to simulate reflection on dark leather (shoes)
A anisotropic litsphere with a mat finish
A sharp anisotropic litsphere, typically used for dark hair
A sharp anisotropic litsphere, typically used for blonde hair
